name: mi-proyecto-blockchain-backend
description: Backend for IngSoftware blockchain project with MySQL and Sequelize

scripts.sync-db: node -e "const { sequelize } = require('./models'); sequelize.sync({ alter: true }).then(() => { console.log('Database synchronized successfully.'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Error synchronizing database:', err); process.exit(1); });"
